name: Dream Chaser (itch) (Alexander Ponomariov)
description:
Controlls:

[SPACEBAR] to interact with objects.
[D] to Move forward.

You play as a regular man, a man that is chasing his dream. Though he is stucked in a loop of a daily routine, you can try your best to break through and reach your Dream.

(Use windows download version for best experience)

Design: Alexander Ponomarov

Art: Kateryna Hnativ

Music by Clement Panchout: https://soundcloud.com/clement-panchout
